snippet: A clip of the 2008 interview, in which Roger Clemens says he was advised not to talk to George J. Mitchell, could violate attorney-client privilege, a judge said Monday.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Judge Reggie Walton will not allow prosecutors in the Roger Clemens perjury trial to show Clemens' 2008 interview with 60 Minutes because of attorney-client privileges; other baseball results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: A clip of the 2008 interview, in which Roger Clemens says he was advised not to talk to George J. Mitchell, could violate attorney-client privilege, a judge said Monday.

headline.seo: Judge Bans Portion of Roger Clemens ’60 Minutes’ Interview
headline.main: Judge Bans Key Portion of Interview With Clemens
headline.print_headline: Judge Bans Key Portion Of Interview With Clemens
